timeline.bodyText: This is good.  Just putting this comment here so that you know that for some kinds of clusters, such as OKE & OpenShift, the tests will not have direct file system access to the host path. We will need to come and change to later to run tests against OKE or OpenShift. In those cases, we will likely have an NFS mount and you won't be able to access the files from this code without doing something like running another job that mounts the pv/pvc.

replies.bodyText:
The 32001 port is passed to domain creation scripts and used internally.
The
addChannelsItem(new Channel()
.channelName("T3Channel")
.nodePort(0))
simply exposes that 32001 with available port in the node
